docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., April 24 -- Three small states -- Syria, Thailand and Uruguay -- persuaded a United Nations committee today to hold off action on a series of complaints against the South African Government's administration of its neighboring...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., April 24 -- Three small states -- Syria, Thailand and Uruguay -- persuaded a United Nations committee today to hold off action on a series of complaints against the South African Government's administration of its neighboring mandate of South-West Africa.
docs.abstract: UN com agrees to delay action on complaints against Union adm; reasons; Union acknowledges UN inv to join com seeking settlement of dispute

docs.lead_paragraph: LIMA, Peru -- The Fourth Inter-American Tourism Conference ended here last week its eight-day round of committee and general meetings with a sizable record of achievement. Out of the eighty-nine resolutions submitted by five committees, the conference passed seventy - one.

docs.lead_paragraph: Nelson A. Rockefeller, who knows as much about Latin America as any "Yanqui," said in a speech he made to the Women's National Republican Club on Tuesday that "disunity and unrest in many parts of Latin America are far more widespread and serious than most people in the United States realize."

docs.snippet: The double-decked Stratocruiser Good Hope, of Pan American World Airways, due here from Buenos Aires at 6 o'clock last night, disappeared while flying over northern Brazil yesterday. The plane had been scheduled to make a stop at Port-of-Spain,...
docs.lead_paragraph: The double-decked Stratocruiser Good Hope, of Pan American World Airways, due here from Buenos Aires at 6 o'clock last night, disappeared while flying over northern Brazil yesterday. The plane had been scheduled to make a stop at Port-of-Spain, Trinidad, at 9:20 A. M. yesterday but no word had been received last night of the fate of it or its forty-one passengers and nine crew members.

docs.lead_paragraph: JERUSALEM is to become the site of large-scale international festivals of music, the dance and the drama, as soon as the "Binyanei Ha'Umah" (The National Convention Center Buildings) are completed. A. Ezer, director of the center, is sure he can keep his first deadline.

headline.main: JERUSALEM FESTIVAL; Annual Event Is Planned Starting Next Spring
